author: @blindprogrammer
text: if more than one features, I think we need to repeat this process for every features, and we split the tree based on the feature which has max info gain. For example, if there are two features f1 and f2 and there are 10 rows (experiments) then this process will be repeated 20 times then we can conclude on which feature to split the tree either f1 or f2.
